title: Effect of insecticide treatment on plant growth 4

content.question: In a second experiment, researchers used a different insecticide that affects a different group of insects. In this treatment, the number of seeds formed was greatly reduced compared to the control. Based on this observation, describe the most likely interaction between the affected insects and the plants in this experiment. Justify your response.

frqParts.text: In a second experiment, researchers used a different insecticide that affects a different group of insects. In this treatment, the number of seeds formed was greatly reduced compared to the control. Based on this observation, describe the most likely interaction between the affected insects and the plants in this experiment. Justify your response.

skill.text: 5.D: Use data to evaluate a hypothesis or prediction, including rejecting or failing to reject the null hypothesis.
